name: Restaurant Point of Sale
short_description:
Cloud based fully featured restaurant and take-away pint of sale. Easy to operate. Includes menu planning, costing and portion-control. Recipe entering. Table-side ordering. Works on any device online, works on any computer offline or online. Main computer software is free, additional terminals are part of a cloud based system. Cloud services are not free, but charged at a minimal rate of less than $12 per month.
System include:
Floor layout plan
Guest bill allocation
Table bill allocation
Take-away order flow for drive through
Option menu item costing
Split-bill
Country specific sales tax integration
Time based, seasonally based and daily based menus
Staff clock-in, out
Wages
Sales reporting
Table booking
Change tables
Automatic shopping lists 
Ordering system
Enter shippers
Enter customers
Enter suppliers
Inventory control :food and non-food items
Purchase control
Expense tracking
Real time table watch, which tables are occupied, waiting, clean, eating, paying
summary: Restaurant point of sale works offline and online
